title: My Favorite Manager
alternative_title: Favorite Manager ; My Favorite Manager ; 최애의 매니저
status: Favorite Manager ; My Favorite Manager ; 최애의 매니저
description:
Description :
        The 29-year-old man, Lee Yoonsoo, whose mental state has collapsed due to continuous interview failures. He falls in love with a female cam girl he happens to come across, Yuria, and ends up joining Yuria's affiliated management company, Blue Cloud, on her recommendation. Yoonsoo becomes Yuria's dedicated manager through his senior's referral. He finds happiness in witnessing Yuria's everyday life, but the moment he sees her true self, he is in for a big shock.

Original Webtoon
